Introduction

Eve, formerly known as Yeri, is a South Korean singer, dancer, model, and live-streamer on the platform AfreecaTV under FA Entertainment. She is a member and the Vocalist, Dancer, and Maknae of the South Korean girl group FlyWithMe and was a member of Black Bunny under the name Yeri under LA Entertainment.

She originally debuted in the South Korean girl group Black Bunny on June 3, 2019, with the digital single "Oh! My God". She left Black Bunny sometime in 2019 before they silently disbanded in 2020, to join FlyWithMe. On February 3, 2021, she debuted as a member of the South Korean girl group FlyWithMe.

Eve went on a hiatus starting August 31st, 2022, but seems to be active with the group almost immediately.
